TopicTitle: Kerbal Konstructs question about alternative Mod

Articles.Content:
Ever since the most recent update to KSP I havnt been able to use Kerbal Konstructs, after clicking CTRL K the menu pulls up but is blank. I cannot click or interact with any of its features and also cannot exit it once it is pulled up. 

My questions are 

1: Has this been an issue anyone has been able to work around? If so, please share I am good at following instructions.

2: Are there any other mods that will allow me to place a launchpad on another part of Kerbin? I need at the very least to do that because the reusable rockets that I like to build cant reach any other potential landing sites. I need to therefor place a launch site on the opposite side of the continent to KSC so that my rockets can launch there and land at KSC where the ground is flat enough. 

 

Please help, and thank you for your feedback
